curl模拟post请求提交 !

15 Jul 2014

header('content-type:text/html;charset=utf-8'); function curlPost($url,$data,$method){ $ch = curl_init(); //1.初始化 curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url); //2.请求地址 curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $method);//3.请求方式 //4.参数如下 curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, FALSE);//https curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, FALSE); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, 'Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 5.01; Windows NT 5.0)');//模拟浏览器 ...
